description.narrative: To further Sahanivasa's work in protecting human and environmental health in respect to large-scale, corporate agricultural projects and pesticide use. They will engage in awareness raising campaigns with agricultural workers, indigenous people, as well as policy makers on the dangers of pesticides; take up the campaign for banning Endosulfan in the country; advocate for better monitoring of pesticide imports (currently 67 globally banned pesticides are sold in India); and host workshops with other NGOs to build a stronger campaign and movement against pesticide use in the country. In their awareness raising work, they will host film screening, distribute educational materials to peasant communities, engage in public demonstrations, and host workshops with farmers and communities
